channel.title: Pixelcade on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in Pixelcade on Paul Cutler

item.title: Pixelcade
item.description: I sold a bunch of my old Sonos equipment and decided to splurge on the arcade. I had been looking at GameOnGrafix for artwork for the side panels and the marquee for the arcade cabinet. I was undecided what I wanted to do as Kelly has a vinyl cutter, so it might be possible to make my own side panel art, but I was going to need a marquee. And then I found the Pixelcade, which is an LED marquee.
